title: The Official Site Wants You to Come to the Exhibition in 2010
post:
If you translate the current Italian language web page into English you will find, among other notices about the 2015 Exposition, the following statement:  
Reservations
At the moment you can not book any pilgrimage to the exposition in 2015. Reservations will be carried out, however, from this site, http://www.sindone.org . All information will be soon available on the net.
In 2010 the reservation system went online about 9 months before the exposition. It is obvious they have not yet updated the page completely. Here’s a link to an English translation of the Italian language page: http://translate.googleusercontent.com/translate_c?depth=1&hl=en&rurl=translate.google.com&tl=en&u=http://www.sindone.org/santa_sindone/00023930_Santa_Sindone.html&usg=ALkJrhi4qux22aV7qVpWahno6AnHGRPCJw 
Obviously, they have not yet updated the English version on their site.
author: Barrie Schwortz
